title: 'The BEST!'

title: 'Top class quality'
body: The media could not be loaded. This is the most underrated product of Amazon!!! You cannot this type of high quality material under 500rs anywhere !!! The cloth is extremely comfortable, soft and of high quality!!!! Even the expensive brands don't offer products like this. I purchased 2 for this reason. It dries quickly, has 2 zipper pockets. Just amazing, colour is also fresh! Length is also perfect not too short!!! Go for the usual size you wear, if you order a larger size than usual it will not look good at all.
